overview: Ashley was raised in a picture perfect all-American family with two moms, two grandpas, two uncles, and a little brother. But Ashley has a problem, she has a crush on a boy at school, which is against everything this world has ever taught her.
tagline: Imagine a world... ...Where ‘gay’ was ‘straight’ – and ‘straight’ was ‘gay’
title: Love Is All You Need?
